long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About extension:

Introducing Flow, the ultimate browser enhancement companion designed to revolutionize your browsing experience. With a sleek side panel interface, Flow combines aesthetic appeal with powerful productivity tools to elevate your workflow and relaxation.
Customizable Live Wallpaper: Transform your side panel's backdrop with a curated selection of live wallpapers, adding a touch of elegance and personalization to your browsing environment.
Background Audio: Tune into tranquility with our background audio feature, allowing you to choose ambient sounds to enhance focus, relaxation, or creativity as you browse.

Pomodoro Timer: Boost productivity with our versatile Pomodoro Timer, offering three distinct modesâ€”Pomodoro, Short Break, and Long Break. Tailor the duration of each session to match your workflow preferences and maximize efficiency.
Clock: Stay on track and organized with our sleek clock display, keeping you informed of the current time at a glance.
Notes and To-Do Lists: Keep your thoughts organized and tasks in check with integrated note-taking and to-do list features, conveniently accessible within the side panel.
Improved New Tab Design: Say goodbye to mundane new tab pages! Flow introduces a refined new tab layout, featuring a stylish clock display, a streamlined search bar, and the option to personalize your browsing experience with a custom greeting.

Enhance your browsing journey with Flow, your all-in-one solution for a visually captivating, productive, and personalized Chrome experience.

Useful Information:
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing Flow extension, change New Tab to that provided by the service, New Tab searches to be powered by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Just start by typing preferred search term (query) into the search box. The Flow extension search will provide Bing SERP with proper results.
To remove the Flow extension simply go to Google Chrome "Settings" page. Find the "Extensions" in the settings menu and there you will find Flow extension listed.
To uninstall it just use the "Remove" button.
Permissions Requested: "Replace the page you see when opening a new tab"

About us:
Flow  team is dedicated to creating genuine products which will be useful for our users. We tend to provide GDPR aligned products, always prioritizing users' privacy. 
Considering that, we recognize that location-sharing is a concern for many people (ourselves included) and it is a responsibility we take very seriously. For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit our Privacy policy below.
